additional_requirement: Explore regulatory challenges and safety concerns.
Focus on measures to prevent medical errors and enhance patient care safety.
Include questions on ethical considerations and historical controversies.
Focus on safety regulations and accident prevention measures.
Discuss the impact on human health and safety regulations.
Discuss the ethical approval process and patient safety measures.
Cover recent changes in regulations and their impact on worker safety.
Analyze the impact of compliance on personal and organizational safety.
Discuss ethical dilemmas and safety considerations in cultural practices.
Explore safety and regulatory challenges in the informal sector.
